questions.question: According to the text, what are the two main phases of industrialization?
options: A) The Agrarian Revolution and the Digital Age
B) The First Industrial Revolution (1750-1850) and the Second Industrial Revolution (1870-1914)
C) The Bronze Age and the Iron Age
D) The Early Modern Period and the Contemporary Era

questions.question: Which invention from the First Industrial Revolution, developed by James Hargreaves, significantly increased textile production by allowing workers to produce multiple threads at once?
options: A) Puddling Furnace
B) Cotton Gin
C) Spinning Jenny
D) Macadamized Roads

questions.question: Nikolaus Otto developed which significant innovation in 1876, enabling a more efficient alternative to steam power?
options: A) The first practical telephone
B) The four-stroke internal combustion engine
C) The first long-lasting light bulb
D) The method for macadamized roads

questions.question: What was the primary purpose of the Puddling Furnace, developed by Henry Cort during the First Industrial Revolution?
options: A) To separate cotton fibers from seeds
B) To improve transportation networks through better road construction
C) To remove impurities from pig iron to produce higher-quality wrought iron
D) To enable real-time conversations over long distances

questions.question: Who patented the first practical telephone in 1876, an innovation that transformed business and personal interactions?
options: A) Thomas Edison
B) Karl Benz
C) Alexander Graham Bell
D) Eli Whitney
